@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2012 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Christopher Zuendorf (czuendorf) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Creates a drawer widget inside the given parent widget. The parent widget can be assigned as a constructor argument. If no parent is set, the application's root will be assumed as parent. A drawer widget can be assigned to left, right, top or bottom edge of its parent by property orientation. The drawer floats in on show() and floats out on hide(). Additionally the drawer is shown by swiping in reverse direction on the parent edge to where the drawer is placed to: Orientation: left, Swipe: right on parents edge: Drawer is shown etc. The drawer is hidden when user taps the parent area outside of the drawer. This behaviour can be deactivated by the property hideOnParentTap. 

  var drawer = new qx.ui.mobile.container.Drawer();
  drawer.setOrientation("right");
  drawer.setTapOffset(100);
  var button = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Button("A Button");
  drawer.add(button);

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
parent {qx.ui.mobile.container.Composite?null} The widget to which
 the drawer should be added, if null it is added to app root.
@param.description:
The widget to which
 the drawer should be added, if null it is added to app root.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
layout {qx.ui.mobile.layout.Abstract?null} The layout that should be
 used for this container.
@param.description:
The layout that should be
 used for this container.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the drawer changes its size.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Property for setting the orientation of the drawer. Allowed values are: left,right,top,bottom

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The size of the drawer in px. This value is interpreted as width if orientation is left | right, as height if orientation is top | bottom.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Indicates whether the drawer should hide when the parent area of it is tapped.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Indicates whether the drawer should hide when a back action appear form a key event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the size of the tapping area, where the drawer reacts on swipes for opening itself.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The duration time of the transition between shown/hidden state in ms.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the drawer zIndex position relative to its parent.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Shows the drawer.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: properties {Map} The animation properties to set. Key / value pairs.
@param.description: The animation properties to set. Key / value pairs.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Hides the drawer.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: properties {Map} The animation properties to set. Key / value pairs.
@param.description: The animation properties to set. Key / value pairs.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Strict way to hide this drawer. Removes the blocker from the parent, and hides the drawer without any animation. Should be called when drawer's parent is animated and drawer should hide immediately.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Returns true when the widget is hidden
@return.description: Returns true when the widget is hidden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Enables the transition on this drawer.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Disables the transition on this drawer.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the target widget which is responsible for the transition handling.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Toggle the visibility of the drawer.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handles a back event which appears on the application.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handles a tap on drawers' root.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handles a swipe on layout parent.
